Package rl.photoviewer.fx.view

Contains classes to create the JavaFX-based version of the photo viewer's view component.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgilePhotoViewerApp
    Central class for creating and running the Agile Photo Viewer FX application.
    AgilePhotoViewerCtrl
    Controller which is responsible for handling all kinds of user events.
    AgilePhotoViewerCtrl.Sec  
    ControlPaneMenu
    This class provides a context menu for the Control Pane.
    ImageViewCtrl
    Controller which is responsible for handling user events for an image pane.
    MapDataViewCtrl
    Controller which is responsible for handling user events for a map image pane.
    MapViewMenu
    This class provides a context menu for the Map View.
    MarkerFactory
    Factory which creates Markers for the map pane.
    ViewParams
    Provides parameters and simple computations to scale and translate images for viewing.

Package rl.photoviewer.fx.view Description

Contains classes to create the JavaFX-based version of the photo viewer's view component. Class AgilePhotoViewerApp starts the application. The architecture is inspired by the model - view - presenter pattern. File AgilePhotoViewer.fxml defines the layout of the view component. AgilePhotoViewer.css provides a dark theme for the GUI. Class AgilePhotoViewerCtrl is the entry point for event handling. It mediates between view and model.
Author:
Ruediger Lunde
